entries.journal_entry_description: Lyman Zavala is a very important person in Tyrena, and he has asked for your help.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Gipson Coloda is Olag Greck's right hand man. Find and kill him, and you may be well on your way to finding Greck himself.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: Gipson was just part of it. With him out of the way you may be able to find your way into Greck's sanctum. I'm sending more information.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Alasdair Bumbalough has the passkey to get into Olag Greck's private sanctum. Get it from him and find Greck.
entries.task03_comm_message_text: You have it! Now use the passkey to get into Greck's Sanctum and take care of him.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: You've got the passkey to get into Greck's Sanctuary. Kill Olag Greck!
entries.task05_comm_message_text: You've done it. Come back to me and let's finish up.
